api_host.title: Cumul.io API Host URL
api_host.description: URL of the Cumul.io API (e.g. 'https://api.cumul.io', 'https://api.us.cumul.io', or VPC-specific API url). Defaults to 'https://api.cumul.io'.

api_key.title: Cumul.io API Key
api_key.description: An API key generated in Cumul.io's platform (can be generated here: https://app.cumul.io/start/profile/integration).

api_token.title: Cumul.io API Token
api_token.description: The corresponding API token generated in Cumul.io's platform (can be generated here: https://app.cumul.io/start/profile/integration).
